user_device_rel: n people to m devices; 1 person to n devices
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
use_cases_desc: Support social interaction that takes place among users.
contribution_desc: Provides an overview over research on local mobile clouds of devices to enable omitting constant communication with the cloud backend. Social Devices. Defines programming concepts and capability specification across devices. Uses an Action-oriented Programming model. Uses BLE for service finding.
